Module tagtraum.japlfind
Package com.tagtraum.macos.finder

Interface FinderWindow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Reference, Window
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DesktopWindow

    @Plural("Finder windows")
@Code("brow")
@Name("Finder window")
@Inherits("window")
public interface FinderWindow
extends Reference, Window
    A file viewer window.
    Author:
    JaplScript 3.4.11
